name: Exhibition company Media deVinco
overview:
Media deVinco provides assistance to companies participating in Russian trade shows and exhibitions. Media deVinco provides assistance to companies participating in Russian trade shows and exhibitions. We help you maximize your tradeshow results and decrease costs by giving the coordinated support together with a focused solution of exhibition design, construction and management services.

By applying objective marketing expertise, we create the most cost effective type of exhibition stand for your company.What is more, we offer our clients the price 15-30% less than what they have been offered by other companies.

Services:

Stand construction and design Marketing and PR Promotion Business consultancy Travel Logistics
